labels.phoneIsNotConfigured: This phone number is not configured yet. Please try again later.
labels.noAvailableAgent: There is no agent available. Please leave a message after the beep.
labels.applicationError: An application error has occured. Please call back later.
labels.forbiddenExternalCalls: External calls for your user are not permitted. Contact your administrator to enable this possibility.

fields.greetingAtCallStart: Greeting at the beginning of the call
fields.farewell: Farewell at the end of the call

tooltips.voicemailGreetingText: When no agent is available the call will be forwarded to the voicemail. This text will be played for the caller before he leaves a message. The field is ignored when Voicemail Greeting Audio file is uploaded.
tooltips.voicemailGreetingFile: When no agent is available the call will be forwarded to the voicemail. This audio will be played for the caller before he leaves a message.
tooltips.greetingFile: This audio will be played for the caller at the beginning of the call.
tooltips.greetingText: This text will be played for the caller at the beginning of the call. The field is ignored when Greeting Audio file is uploaded.
tooltips.voicemailNotifications: Types of notification for a new voicemail message.
tooltips.farewellFile: This audio will be played for the caller at the ending of the call.
tooltips.farewellText: This text will be played for the caller at the ending of the call. The field is ignored when Farewell Audio file is uploaded.
